txt.en: 'Let us see how this armour holds up!'
'Time to test this armour in some friendly combat!'
Testing the Defences
'It fits well. Thank you!'
'The armour is quite sturdy.'
Talk to Angbor

'I tell you, the Haradrim were dauntless. My men and I held against wave after wave of them until I saw that we must gain some advantage or be worn down to defeat. I led a charge and drove them back to the river, where my archers rained down arrows upon their rafts as they came across. It was thus that we rebuffed them, though not without great effort.\n\n'The men here on the Pelennor are wearied, but still they must train. Will you go down to the sparring area and put their new armour to the test? They could surely gain from a combat tip or two from such a seasoned campaigner as yourself.'
Test the soldier's new armour in combat
Talk to a soldier at the sparring area in Aragorn's pavilion
Talk to another soldier at the sparring area in Aragorn's pavilion

Soldiers with new armour can be found in the sparring area in Aragorn's Pavilion, on the after-battle Pelennor.\n\nSoldiers are ready to spar with you in an effort to improve their skills and test their armour.
Test the soldier's new armour in combat

Soldiers with new armour can be found in the sparring area in Aragorn's Pavilion, on the after-battle Pelennor.\n\nSoldiers are ready to spar with you in an effort to improve their skills and test their armour.
Talk to another soldier at the sparring area in Aragorn's pavilion

Soldiers with new armour can be found in the sparring area in Aragorn's Pavilion, on the after-battle Pelennor.\n\nSoldiers are ready to spar with you in an effort to improve their skills and test their armour.
'This armour fits well. Let us see how it holds to combat.'
'I am sure this armour is impenetrable.'

Soldiers with new armour can be found in the sparring area in Aragorn's Pavilion, on the after-battle Pelennor.\n\nSoldiers are ready to spar with you in an effort to improve their skills and test their armour.
'I will spar with you when you are ready.'

Soldiers with new armour can be found in the sparring area in Aragorn's Pavilion, on the after-battle Pelennor.\n\nSoldiers are ready to spar with you in an effort to improve their skills and test their armour.
Angbor has successfully provided armour to the soliders but is uncertain of the armour's quality.
'Are you certain this armour will protect me from a Morgul blade?'
'Let us spar and see how this armour holds up in combat.'
Test the soldier's new armour in combat
Talk to another soldier at the sparring area in Aragorn's pavilion
Test the soldier's new armour in combat
You should talk to Angbor, who can be found at Aragorn's Pavilion on the after-battle Pelennor.
Test the soldier's new armour in combat
Talk to another soldier at the sparring area in Aragorn's pavilion
'How did the armour hold up? Good, good! I hope that their spirits stay high in the days to come.'
